fields.summary: ABFS: [FnsOverBlob][Tests] Add Tests For Negative Scenarios Identified for Ingress Operations
fields.description:
We have identified a few scenarios worth adding integration or mocked behavior tests for while implementing FNS Support over Blob Endpoint.

Attached file shows the the scenarios identified for Ingress Related operations on blob Endpoint (Create + Append + Flush filesystem calls)

This Jira tracks implementing these tests.

comments.body:
anmolanmol1234 opened a new pull request, #7424:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7424

   This PR covers 2 changes:-
   
   1. Removed the need for an additional list for storing the committedBlockEntries and replaced it with a string builder which is then cleared out during outputstream close.
   2. Added tests for the negative scenarios identified for the append flush cases.

anmolanmol1234 opened a new pull request, #7572:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7572

   This PR covers 2 changes:-
   
   Removed the need for an additional list for storing the committedBlockEntries and replaced it with a string builder which is then cleared out during outputstream close.
   Added tests for the negative scenarios identified for the append flush cases.
